title: Rosies walk and 4 other stories
creator_contributor_role: Victorian Council for Children's Films and Television, distributor
subject_group: Literature/Children's literature - Film and video adaptations
description: Episode of Series "Children's circle". A compilation of 5 delightful and timeless children's stories from around the world. Watch how Rosie the hen on her daily walk, outfoxes the wily fox in "Rosie's walk" by Pat Hutchins. "The story of Ping" by Marjorie Flack, takes us to China on an adventure with Ping, the duck. Tomie de Paola's "Charlie needs a cloak" shows how Charlie the shepherd makes his new winter cloak. H.A. Ray's classic "Curious George rides a bicycle" has delighted readers of all ages while in "Norman the doorman" by Don Freeman, Norman the mouse harbours a secret ambition to be a great artist, while he stands on guard outside the mouse entrance of the Museum of Art.
